content: TE-Y-GB (SDS Max) Cruciform drill bit SDS Max (TE-Y) cruciform hammer drill bit for larger-diameter drilling into concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Extreme durability – brazed hard metal-carbide-tipped head means you can drill more with the same cruciform bit Fast, smooth drilling – large helix engineered to efficiently transport dust away from the tip of the drill bit Easily replaceable helix – you can further prolong the lifespan of these cruciform drill bits by replacing worn helix segments on the jobsite Various lengths available – choose from multiple working lengths of steel core with 6 or 9 exchangeable helix segments, to best suit drilling through- or blind holes Helix segments and lockring are available as spare parts Applications Drilling larger-diameter penetrations in concrete and masonry Through-hole drilling in concrete and masonry For use in a wide range of heavy power tools with a TE-Y (SDS Max) connection end ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Concrete, Masonry, Brick, Limestone Working mode: Hammer drilling Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Base material | Concrete, Masonry, Brick, Limestone | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2355263 - Bell-shaped bit TE-Y GB 66/59-2 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2342170 - Bell-shaped bit TE-Y GB 80/60 - 3 1/8 - Package Size 1 pc
